descripton: the tree is strong and tall, it is full of life and a unique green color

name: place
descripton: The place is abandoned, but you can hear echoes of its previous history.

name: entrance
descripton: everyone comes in through the entrance of building.

name: front door
descripton: the front door has let in many different people over the years

descripton: The wood seems very unique in its attributes.

name: wooden stools
descripton: The stool is old and uneven.

name: stone carvings
descripton: The carving appears to be of language of its own, unfamiliar to anyone in the kingdom. To know it, would be to know the story these markings are hiding in plain sight.

name: building

name: kettle
descripton: The kettle has a large dent on one side, and is scratched in a few places.

name: small bed

name: dirty wooden bucket
descripton: The rickety bucket's contents have been removed, leaving a filthy residue.

name: desk
descripton: The desk is made of sturdy oak but is very low to the floor.

name: desk chair
descripton: The desk chair is well worn. It is clear someone spent many a days completing work while sitting there.

name: room
descripton: Don't forget that if you ask for a room in a castle you may get your wish and end up in a dungeon cell.

name: pictures
descripton: the picture is very beautifully framed.

name: polished gold

name: long table

name: pictures trimmed in gold
descripton: The picture seems to have an elegant gold trim around it.

name: gold silverware
descripton: On further inspection of the gold silverware you notice that it has the King's initials engraved on each piece.

name: boulders

name: cattle
descripton: This cattle has a shiny red coat with white spots across it.

name: cows grazing

name: barrels for crops
descripton: The barrel is made out of oak and supposed to hold crops for the week.

descripton: Looks like nobody ever used this hoe for digging. It looks brand new and has no stains

name: summit
descripton: It's foggy and the air is thin at this place. There are bones lining the pathway to the very top, it would seem a lot have parished travelling through here.
THe summit almost reaches the clouds. You could see miles of the vast terrain beneath your feet from the peak.

name: dirty trails
descripton: The trail is long, winding, and covered in mud.

name: streams
descripton: The stream flows quietly, twisting and turning its way about.

descripton: It is a mountain of disgusting and putrid trash.

The old wood chair has seen better days, but you'd still sit on it, were it not for the one broken leg.

name: crossbow with no string
descripton: The crossbow is made of wood and broken from being used in combat too much

name: rag dool with the head detached

name: mattresses
descripton: All of the mattresses are stiff and lumpy, providing no comfort.

name: gallows

name: priceless painting of past kings
descripton: The painting details the kings crown very well

name: banners

name: colorful tapestries
descripton: The tapestry is dusty and old, with exquisite stitches in the shape of a dragon

name: large stone fireplace

the fireplace has a lot wood ready to be lit.

name: double thick wooden door
descripton: After looking closely this door is a double door and it is made of wood.

name: floor to ceiling mirror
descripton: The tall mirror stretches from the floor to the ceiling, clearly displaying your reflection.

name: heavy blanket
descripton: The heavy blanket is incredibly comfortable.

name: ornate chairs

name: bones of the innocent
descripton: These poor innocent bones, they deserve a proper burial.

name: mudpit
descripton: The mud pit is bubbling slightly, as if gases from underground are being released.

name: vegetation
descripton: the vegetation is overgrown with weeds and grass.

name: carcasses
descripton: The deer carcass has been badly torn.  You do not want to encounter whatever destroyed the creature.
The carcass is festering and leaves a stench in the air.

name: Legendary swords
descripton: The sword is very old, you would assume it had once belonged to a legendary warrior.
The sword's legend is known by everyone, it is famous throughout the land.

name: Pieces of armor
descripton: The piece of armor is polished to a dazzling shine.  It is unscratched and flawless.

name: magical crystal

name: Gold coins
descripton: This coin has been worn down and is slightly corroded, as if it has spent time in a river.

name: Tapestries depicting battles won
descripton: The tapestry was stained with the blood of enemies and used as a reminder of the dangers of war

name: 80-foot tall bronze statue of a 8 legged Goddess

The statue is of an 8 legged goddess and seems to be built entirely of bronze. It towers over you even from a distance.

name: money
descripton: The small, tarnished coin is imprinted with a seal you don't recognize.

name: painting and works of art of the goddess,
descripton: The works of art depict the goddess in flowing robes and a crown of gold. The painting is oil on canvas inside a gilded frame.

name: Tapestries of important historical value,
descripton: The tapestry has many colors and displayed a historical scene.
The work of art has depictions of forest animals, gathered around a woman. The woman smiles, seemingly at the rabbit.

name: ornate tables
descripton: The table is very ornate and beautiful.
Made of a dark cherry wood, and engraved on its sides with scenes of epic battles, the table has undoubtedly been host to meals for both noblemen and knights.

name: rope bridge
descripton: The ancient rope bridge appears fragile and rickety, swaying to and fro in the wind.  The bridge floor is made of planks of rotting wood which, if stepped through, would abruptly pull the victim down to an unsuspecting death.

name: babbling brook
descripton: The babbling brook flows gently over rocks. This brook supplies my horses and crops with water.

name: horse tack
descripton: The horse tack is made of hardened leather and molded iron. It is designed perfectly to fit a horse.

name: hay shovels
descripton: the hay shovel is new but heavily used. there are remnants of matter other than hay, indicaitng the owner's have gottent their money's worth
The shovel was rusty with bits of hay lingering on it.

name: water troughs
descripton: The wooden trough is broken from holding the heavy water and grass

name: medicines
descripton: The medicine is a dark brown color, and looks like it tastes disgusting.

name: bee hive
descripton: There is a gentle buzzing or humming sound coming from the beehive, and a few bees can be seen coming and going from it.

descripton: This small place is perfect for merryiment and joy.

name: lamp posts
descripton: The lamp post has nicks and scratches on it. From what, nobody knows.

name: trash bins
descripton: The trash bins are in a row, some appeared empty.

name: park benches
descripton: The bench is made of smooth stone and is comfortable when you sit on it.

name: antlers on the wall

name: rusty gate
descripton: The marking etched into the rusty gate reveal its history and tells its story.

name: runes
descripton: the runes are hard

name: rake

name: the beds

name: The crosses displayed on the walls.

name: paddles

name: old statues

name: red and white candles

the book contains the man's connection to his God through prayer.

the tent is small and is new, it has an interesting brown and orange tone.

name: gears
descripton: the gear is not functional.

the lever is rusted and cold. it does not appear to have been shifted in a long time, maybe years.

name: sheets

name: homespun blankets

name: building walls

name: a well
descripton: the wishing well is dry, which doesn't give one the best sense of having their wishes granted.

name: A copper vase

name: A leather cloth
descripton: The leather cloth smells of fresh cow hide
Worn out and beaten leather cloth.

name: Animal skins used as rugs

name: gunpowder

name: helmets

name: floors
descripton: the floor is wooden

The floor is shiny and extravagant it has a weird patter.

name: brushes

name: tape

descripton: Look at all these merchant stands, There are so many items to look at!

name: grapes

name: chocolate milk
descripton: The glass of chocolate milk has a slight film on top, as though it has been sitting out for a long time.

name: Weapons
descripton: The weapon looks light and delicate, as though it couldn't really hurt anyone.

name: pamphlets
descripton: The pamphlet is made out of paper and has a lot of information inside it.

name: racks of plain clothing
descripton: the clothing is long and colorful.

name: polishing cloths

name: clothes brushes
descripton: The cloth was clean and bright in all its colors, stealing it comes to mind.

descripton: The mattress is stained and smelly as if it has been stuck in a barn for ages.

name: pans
descripton: The pan is rusty, not having been ished in sometime

name: napkins
descripton: The napkin is filthy with old food and wine stains.

name: medicine
descripton: The is so much medicine, you can barely pick which one you need. Perhaps you don't need any of it....

name: cell phone
descripton: A curious dull colored object that seems to come to life and glow at random times.

name: computer

name: bones of unlucky spelunkers
descripton: The bone is brittle and almost broken from being trampled on too many times.

name: giant club
descripton: On further inspection of the giant club you notice it was stained with blood from the battle at the castle earlier.

name: giant firepit
descripton: The firepit is made of large stones.  Dead grass fills the center.

name: headstones
descripton: Here are the headstones, in this sacred field, where lie the heroes who gave their lives, so that this kingdom would survive before the fiefs that wanted to plunder it and take advantage of its wealth.

name: mausoleum
descripton: The mausoleum is shrouded in fog and you think you hear strange noises from within.

name: shovels

name: seat
descripton: The seat is dirty with the blood from the farmers.

name: golden trim
descripton: The trim is beautiful and expensive. You wonder who would wear something like this.

name: a golden cloth
descripton: The cloth is gold and shimmers when moved in light.

name: Prayer beads
descripton: The prayer beads are made of wood and look well worn.

name: baubles
descripton: The bauble is no bigger than a pebble, but it's shiny glow gives it an ornate appearance.

name: old pictures

name: travelers
descripton: The traveler is wearing ragged cloth shoes, a torn smock and a cap embellished with the feather of a hawk.

name: Crow bar
descripton: The crow bar is shiny and beutiful, it is made out of a weird metal alloy.

name: bat
descripton: The bat appears to be from a coat of arms.

name: small metal bucket
descripton: The metal bucket appears to be made of copper, with multiple dents and scratches on the the surface.

name: bars
descripton: The bars of gold have a wonderful glow, even though they have been hidden for years.

name: blanket
descripton: The blanket is made from thick cotton, and it is a dull red color.

name: food tray
descripton: A simple tray, to put one's food on.

name: boats floating
descripton: The boat is old, gnarled, and rotted, and smells of spoiled fish.

name: ropes and other tools
descripton: An assortment of hemp strands that have been twisted and braided into a strong rope.

name: bait buckets
descripton: The bucket is raw with the smell of fish, it has darkened with age

name: Arrows
descripton: The arrow is so beat up and dirty, you can see indention's in it.

name: Bows
descripton: This bow has very detailed carvings

name: a huge window in the front
descripton: The large window is clear with minimal distortion.

name: many rows of items

name: bright colored curtains
descripton: The curtain is a vivid purple and made of a shiny, soft fabric. You think its owner must be quite extravagant.

name: potions and cures for sale
descripton: There are potions and cures for sale every morning in the market.

name: church
descripton: The church is beautifully decorated with floor to ceiling stained glass windows.

name: narrow door

name: blue floors
descripton: The floor has a blue color that is faded because of its old age and lack of upkeep.

name: black ceiling
descripton: The ceiling is black and made of thick stones.

name: an armor set
descripton: The armor set is heavy and made of iron.  It will protect a body from harm.

name: clouds

name: fog
descripton: The fog is heavy and hard to see through.

name: path
descripton: A path trodden through by some.

name: evergreen trees
descripton: The evergreen trees line the castle walls, providing a beautiful deep green hue.

name: icicles

name: merchandise
descripton: The merchandise is unique.  It is homemade for the square.

name: kettles
descripton: The kettle is warm with boiling water in it.

name: coral reef

name: pit-fall trap

name: glowing rocks
descripton: The rock appears to glow in the moonlight, illuminating the path it lines.

name: poisonous plants

name: wrecked ships
descripton: The ship has almost completely rotted away, clearly having been at this wreck site for a very long time.

name: torn fabric
descripton: The torn fabric is used as a cloth atop the royal dinner table.

name: thin sticks
descripton: Thin sticks that may be used to stoke a fire.

name: orange sand
descripton: The sand is a small grain that sits on top of the horse's neck.

name: A campfire.
descripton: The campfire looks warm and inviting.  It gives off a soft glow as the wood crackles and pops cheerfully.

name: A spring nearby.
descripton: The spring is gently bubbling, and steam rises off the water.

name: long curtains
descripton: The curtain is made of a heavy material.  It is long and flowing.

name: marble floor
descripton: This floor shines as if it has never seen the bottom of a dirty boot.

name: shrubbery

name: bushes
descripton: This lush bush has an assortment of birds, nesting in it.

name: lilypad
descripton: Right now, this lily pad is only the size of a child's fist. Soon, however, it will grow to be several feet wide.

name: algae
descripton: That algae may look harmless until it starts eating your flesh.

name: brown doors
descripton: The brown door is tall and intimidating. It is made of thick wood.

name: church guides
descripton: Church guides are so nice and helpful, you can always talk to them.

name: music organ
descripton: The organ is severely out of tune, so it must not be used often.

name: coconut tree
descripton: The coconut tree towers above the tropical landscape.  Heavy coconuts sway with the tree in the breeze.

name: wooden boat parts
descripton: The wooden boat part is carefully crafted and sanded to the point of being smooth. The lacquer provides a clean shine to it.

name: makeshift stall.
descripton: The quickly made stall was very unstable and not very well built.

name: The stones
descripton: This stone is extremely rough and heavy.
The stone appears to be smooth as if worn by water, but there is not river near.

name: The gold in his pocket.
descripton: Fine shiny gold pieces, of great value.

name: the clearing
descripton: The clearing is an open field with a few cut down tree stumps.

name: old pine trees
descripton: The pine tree is still standing after 700 years and it is easy to see why people continue to watch it.

name: haystacks
descripton: A large pile of wheat stalks that emit a musty farmyard fragrance.

name: sickle
descripton: The handle has been worn from use, and the blade is old and caked with dirt. This is a real farmer's tool, not something that's been used as ornamentation.

name: cliff
descripton: The cliff is a great vantage point to watch over the valley and see any intruders approaching.

name: ocean
descripton: The ocean is mighty and salty. The waves are really strong and there are some sharks swimming close to the shore

name: drawbridge
descripton: The drawbridge is old and massive, protecting its surroundings from anyone who dare attempt to cross.

name: torture instrument
descripton: The spike gleam wickedly and are flecked with dried blood on this torture implement.  You're not quite sure how it is used, but it looks painful.

name: Dirty Rug
descripton: The rug was stained with mud from the onslaught of dirty kids that ran over it.

name: Dirty Chandelier with dust and cobwebs on it
descripton: The chandelier hangs high on the ceiling, providing light to things below it.

name: rustic tools
descripton: Hand-held gadgets of the "getting things done" nature.

name: stack of hay
descripton: It is dry and brittle, more like straw yet you see some mold at the bottom.

name: Bits for the horses
descripton: The horse bit is old and worn.

name: Blankets for the stable workers who sleep there
descripton: The blanket is dirty and stained, and has a musty smell to it.

name: fetilizer
descripton: The fertilizer is brown and mushy to the touch.

name: Alter
descripton: The alter is sacred and inscribed with religious words.

name: offering plate
descripton: The offering plate is made of gold and several gold pieces sit atop it already.

name: baptismal
descripton: The baptismal is rather ornate with strange runes and obsidian accents.

name: Sand that is white as snow
descripton: Whether bleached by the sun or made of white shells, this sand is pristine and unblemished.

name: water is as clear as a crystal
descripton: the crystal gem is beautiful.

name: Towels
descripton: The towel is moldy and damp, its usefulness long since passed.

name: huge lock on door
descripton: the door is rusty and dirty.
Glimpsing at the long, it appears to be old and metal, with rusted edges, but a shallow hole in the center requiring a key.

name: molds and fungus
descripton: Musty, slimy residue that clings to the surface of all things wet, or habitable.

name: cast iron skillets
descripton: The black skillet is nicely seasoned, not showing any rusted spots.

name: broken glass
descripton: The glass is shattered in a hundred pieces, it is sharp and dangerous.

name: gray stones
descripton: A grey rock that's not useful for much except possibly ammo for a sling.
The stones formed the basis of the castle walls.

name: Artwork
descripton: The artwork appears to be expensive and made from drawings of a prestigious painter

name: crack
descripton: The crack seems basic and unimpressive.

name: rooms
descripton: The room is dark and the walls are covered in artworks.

name: broken chairs
descripton: The chair is broken, with the back almost completely separated from the seat.

name: compass
descripton: The compass is shiny in the sun and felt warm to your touch. Your very survival depends on it for navigation in unknown lands.

name: different types of swords
descripton: The sword has a clean sharp edge.  It is long and heavy.

name: other types of weapons
descripton: The weapon is too heavy for you to lift and you wonder who it was made for.

name: Spare arrowheads
descripton: The arrowhead is designed to enter a person's body easily.

name: Spare bowstring
descripton: This bowstring is made from animal gut and smoothed over with beeswax to protect it from the elements.  It seems to be a good replacement, should you need it.

name: Lagoon
descripton: The lagoon is small and almost perfectly round. The water is rippling slightly in the breeze.

name: lily pads
descripton: The lilypad is a vibrant shade of green. Its roots dangling far below it.

name: Body parts
descripton: The body part is covered in blood and is somewhat soft to the touch.

name: hard bench
descripton: The hard bench appears to be crafted from solid oak, with a gold base in the shape of bird feet.

name: Gold drapes
descripton: The gold drapes are now tattered and worthless due to the lack of care and upkeep.

name: large dark oak and gold bench
descripton: The bench is very large and made of oak, and has been decorated with great intricacy. The golden carvings seem to hint at the wealth of its owner.

name: wooden cross
descripton: The wooden cross is faded in color from being worn too much by the priest

name: The forest has many trees.
descripton: The tree seems healthy and large. It should prove to be climbable.

name: wood is gathered to make fire
descripton: The wood lay scorched on the ground, and warm to the touch.

name: new trees are built once a year
descripton: The tree is deeply knotted and rough to the touch.

name: The animals that live in the forest
descripton: Upon closer look, it seems to be wounded.

name: The plants besides the trees, like bushes and grass.
descripton: The plant was very colorful and came in many shapes and sizes.

name: horse trough
descripton: The horse trough is already empty and it surprised you.

name: garden plants
descripton: The plant is lush and bright green. It looks healthy and vibrant.

name: stones with inscriptions on them
descripton: The stone has ancient ruins inscribed upon them.

name: horse hitch
descripton: The hitch is heavy and made from the strongest leather.
The horse hitch is made of a weather beaten wood.

name: crown
descripton: Thought of as a holy item, the crown goes only to those who are worthy enough.
The crown glitters and sparkles, its jewel-encrusted design sends light in all directions.

name: graves
descripton: The grave is old enough to have grass growing over it at this point, and the only marker that remains is the engraved stone of the resident.

name: cookpot
descripton: The cookpot is large, heavy, and round. Peering inside, you have trouble seeing the bottom.

name: shelf
descripton: The shelf is sturdy and held in place with rusty iron brackets.  It held a collection of vials and potions.  The bottles are dusty and looked like they've been there for years.

name: Cross
descripton: The cross is broken and with a few dents in the sides.

name: harnesses
descripton: The harness is made of leather and beautiful.

name: precious gems
descripton: The gem is shiny and bright. The last owner took good care of it.
These beautiful precious gems were worn by Queen Martha. They are purple and shiny

name: stacks of gold plates
descripton: The plate is made of glass and is white with a gold rim around it.

name: coins
descripton: The coin seemed old, rusted, and worthless. However, after closer inspection, you reveal the underlying intricate design of the priceless coin.

name: ancient relics
descripton: The ancient relic is worn and what was once an intricate depiction of a king is now faded and hard to see.

name: works of art
descripton: The portrait of the king is an absolute work of art. The depection of him is spot on, and has clearly been painted by a master.

name: crystal chandeliers
descripton: You feel luxurious simply being in the presence of the intricate crystal chandelier, watching the light glimmer off of one of the many thousand pieces of minuscule glass shards, a piece so elaborate that only the extremely wealthy could afford.

name: ice throne
descripton: The sword seems to be old but still reliable enough to cut down a animal.

name: ice goblet
descripton: This goblet is freezing cold to the touch and, while it might keep whatever liquid is inside it very cold, it might also cause your hands to get frostbite.  It seems to shimmer gently as you look upon it.

name: Enchanted torches
descripton: The enchanted torch lit up with a magical purple flame.

name: Ancient fossils
descripton: The fossil is embedded in a piece of shale, and appears to be a small sea creature.

name: Magical gems
descripton: The magical gem pulses a bright red, with swirls of black throughout.

name: timbers
descripton: The timber appears to be riddled with worm holes.

name: block and tackle
descripton: The block and tackle could be used to raise something.

name: mine cart
descripton: The mine cart looks very unsafe, hopefully no one uses it.

name: ore
descripton: The ore looks like a common rock, unpolished and plain.

name: hammer
descripton: Such an old hammer. Looks like the handle is about to break, there are several cracks in it. The metal part is still good

name: nails
descripton: The nail is rusted and worn and is no longer useful.

name: large gate
descripton: The gate is vast and big, but a bit rusty.

name: barn
descripton: The barn is huge and red in color!

name: jars
descripton: The jar seems to have a crack on it. I don't think you can use it anymore.

name: cross
descripton: the cross is large in size, but made of a lightweight wood. it has nails on the left and right sides, indicating it is religious in nature

name: barrels of beer
descripton: The beer is a rich amber ale that smells of hops.

name: Old broom
descripton: the broom is very dusty and fragile.

name: Wood table
descripton: A simple table crafted of rough brown wood.

name: Cabinet
descripton: A cabinet stood out painted pitch black.

name: giant four poster bed
descripton: A great bed that should offer fine rest.

name: fluffy pillows
descripton: The pillow holds all the king's secrets within its soft innards and satin cover. If it could talk it would be the perfect agent against the king.

name: fur carpet
descripton: The carpet is made of an animal's fur.  The carpet is soft and warm.

name: mahogany writing desk
descripton: Beautiful and dark, the solid rectangular desk has ten drawers, ornate golden pulls and a heavily polished surface.

name: chamber pot
descripton: Since there is no plumbing in the kingdom, the townspeople have open chamber pots in their homes to excrete waste into.

name: vanity
descripton: The vanity is made from the finest oak in all the realm. The designs on the sides are of the royal insignia.

name: The field is green and the targets are bright red.
descripton: The target is riddled with arrows from others practicing for battle.

name: A quiver
descripton: The quiver contains a mess of arrows, its leather frame stretched from years of use.

name: A bow
descripton: The bow appears to be made of a dark brown wood, its string is taught and straight, and it is about as long as your arm.

name: A pile of treasure
descripton: a pile of treasure has been picked of all other items. it is simply gold, and no jewelry or other valuables

name: Some chairs
descripton: Among numerous scratches on its surface, you can make out some marking.

name: Torches on the wallls
descripton: The torch burns bright.  The handle is made from sturdy wood.

name: gold plated dome
descripton: A giant cross sits atop the gold plated dome.

name: five chandeliers
descripton: The chandelier is full of cobwebs and contains only the small stubs of candles.

name: hand carved 30 person kings dining table
descripton: A piece of furniture used to set food on while you eat.

name: hand woven rug
descripton: You admire the colorful pattern of the hand woven rug, with hues of intense blues and greens.

name: the palace
descripton: The palace is ornate and enormous, making you wonder what kind of emperor lives inside.

name: The plates that serve the royal members.
descripton: You know the symbols on the plates to be the crest of the royal family. Only royalty may be served from these plates.

name: The jug that holds the wine the servants fill glasses with.
descripton: The jug is very useful for filling glasses of tea at dinner.

name: canopy
descripton: The canopy is falling apart quite a bit, but some sprucing up should fix it.

name: foliage
descripton: The foliage is so thick that it could hide any number of dangers.

name: old armor
descripton: The armor is rusted and dented.

name: old weapons
descripton: The weapon is crafted from pure silver and shines from ample polishing.  It looks like a dagger with a fancy sheath.

name: old machinery lying around, rusting
descripton: The machinery is obviously no longer in working condition

name: Cobwebs are everywhere
descripton: The cobweb forms a beautiful pattern.

name: mining carts
descripton: The mining cart has seen better days. It is old and battered.

name: hang cuffs
descripton: Cold metal cuffs that clang together loudly. You find yourself wondering who has been made to wear them before....
The cuff was broken in two, you wonder if the prisoner is still around.

name: ornate inlay-ed floor decorations
descripton: The floor decoration is ornate.  The floor itself is made of stone tile.
Some object intended for the pleasure of viewing

name: The outside castle
descripton: The castle is made of stone and overlooks a vast land.

name: The stone used is ancient and antique with a shiny gloss of silver.
descripton: The stone is round and smooth, as if it has been polished.

name: The gardens
descripton: The aroma of the garden is relaxing and refreshing, with the plants giving off an assortment of various colors.

name: delightful flowers.
descripton: The flowers are bright and smell of fresh rain, as if they have come from a meadow.

name: the stones used on the entrance door
descripton: The stone is covered in blood

name: The drawbridge to the castle.
descripton: The drawbridge is made of wood and metal.  It is large and wide.

name: plush velvet seats
descripton: The velvet seat is bright and colorful. It is easy on the eye.

name: screen
descripton: The screen is semi-transparent and has a few holes here and there.

name: wood stools
descripton: The stool is sturdy and made of wood.  The seat is made of leather.

name: alcohol tap
descripton: The tap is polished and golden and the beer flows freely from it.

name: cleaning cloth
descripton: Stained with dirt and grit, the cloth is losing its effectiveness.

name: stone bench
descripton: The stone benchis so sturdy and can last a lifetime.

name: cobblestone walkway
descripton: The walkway is made of smooth riverstones and you are impressed with the craftsmanship.

name: flowerpots
descripton: The ceramic flowerpot contains tulips picked from the outside garden

name: quaint manor
descripton: The manor is run-down and covered in vines. You wonder if it will reamain upright through the day.

name: rolling hills
descripton: What a green rolling hill, so many pink flowers grow on it and even some mushrooms

name: small stone fence
descripton: The fence is made from gray stones of different sizes. It's only a few feet high, so it can easily be climbed over.

name: home
descripton: The home is strong and sturdy from being built out of stone

name: bookshop
descripton: The bookshop is covered from floor to ceiling in full bookshelves, and the air of it filled with the scent of leather bindings and old paper.

name: rose bush
descripton: This rose Bush requires a lot of work. Looks like there are a couple of spider webs and there are no actual roses growing

name: small garden
descripton: The small garden is a favorite of the queen's - lined with the most ornate foliage.

name: white wooden gate
descripton: The sturdy white wooden gate towers 20 feet in the air, protecting the people of the village from all kinds of challengers.

name: steel statue
descripton: The steel statue looks like it has seen better days. It's all dirty and has marks all over it.

name: cauldron
descripton: The cauldron can be used for cooking vegetables

name: glass jars
descripton: The jar is glass.  It is dirty and has streaks.

name: spider legs
descripton: The pider leg is hairy and the sight of it makes you panic.

name: dragon toe nails
descripton: The dragon toe nails are covered in thick layers of red blood, the most recent layer appears to be very fresh and still has a pugent odor of iron that lingered heavily.

name: fairy wings
descripton: It is so light and almost transparent, with light shining through it.

name: scepter
descripton: On its handle, you see two red gems gleaming like eyes of an animal.

name: soft bed
descripton: This bed is very small but so ridiculously soft. It looks brand new which is weird because it's 245 years old

name: big rug
descripton: The big rug is soft to the touch.

name: big window
descripton: The glass of the big window is warped and difficult to see through. The streams in the glass appeared as if water frozen in place.

name: a wardrobe
descripton: The wardrobe is made of high quality woods, intricate designs have been carved on its surface.

name: shackles on the wall
descripton: The shackle is rusted and dirty from holding many prisoners

name: a knife
descripton: The knife is clean and well polished.

name: torture devices
descripton: The castle's dungeon is full of complicated and painful torture devices for the King's prisoners.

name: plexi glass like clear structures
descripton: The structures are clear and brilliant.  They are made of a glass like material.

name: Fireplace
descripton: The hot embers are glowing and an occasional spark leaps from the fireplace as you hear the crackle of the firewood burning.
The fireplace gives a beautiful glow and a soothing warmth

name: Pew/bench
descripton: The pew was made of dark oak and was lined with red royal satin.

name: gilded mirrors
descripton: The large mirror is oval in shape. It is gilded around the edges.

name: handmade rug
descripton: The rug is decorated in a intricate striped pattern and is obviously the work of a fine craftsman.

name: tapestries lining the walls depicting past royalty
descripton: The tapestry is large and shows an image of a king giving a flower to a little girl.

name: Goblets
descripton: This goblet is made out of high quality glass. Some initials are engraved on the side

name: a fur skin rug
descripton: This fur skin rug used to be in a hunter's bedroom. It's made out of a brown bear

name: a beaten copper pot
descripton: The copper pot shows years of use, with the copper color beginning to warp on the handle. There are dents throughout the body as well.

name: Broom
descripton: This broom has never seen dirt. The straws are perfect and unscathed.

name: Curtains
descripton: The curtains were made from the best royal blue silk in the land and the Queen's initials were sewn into them.

name: Chairs
descripton: the chair is royal in nature and has engravings and decor all over. it is clear only someone of worth is allowed to sit in it

name: cells
descripton: Oh what an old and screechy sell. Anybody can easily escape from it because the rods are so rusty , they can be easily broken

name: a soaring ceiling painted with the richest cobalt blue and ruby red paints
descripton: The ceiling has the color red to represent the blood of the enemies and rich cobalt blue to represent the blue skies ahead.

name: Gold statues
descripton: This is a gold statue of a Siberian husky.

name: A calm water fountain
descripton: The fountain is large and round. It has carvings of fish on it.

name: Paintings of Gods
descripton: The painting has fiery colors and rough texture.

name: Big ornate doors
descripton: The door is made of a beautiful, bright wood, and it is covered in carvings of trees and animals.

name: wooden counters
descripton: The counter was messy and reeked of a foul stench.

name: stone oven
descripton: An oven made of stone. Used for baking and keeping warm.

name: pot
descripton: The pot is old and cracked, with rust covering the outside.

name: other tools
descripton: The tool has a metal surface and is very shiny.

name: cupboard
descripton: The cupboard is filled with all manner of dishware, its handles long worn down from constantly being opened and closed.

name: Silverware
descripton: The silverware was well taken care of and maintained it's shine

name: vegetable or plant
descripton: This plant is long and hard, growing in a field. It is only edible when boiled.

name: low grass
descripton: The grass, no doubt, required many sheep to keep it low.

name: cloth sacks
descripton: The stained cloth sack has holes cut out for arms to fit through.

name: big table
descripton: The table is large enough for 50 people.

name: Empty mug
descripton: The mug has been used for tea for a very long time.

name: faded letters
descripton: The letter is written on yellowed parchment paper. Each individual letter formed of a soft black undertone.

name: shelves and shelves
descripton: The shelf is made of dark rough-hewn wood and is large enough to hold several books or bowls.

name: staggering variety of wares
descripton: This looks to be a shallow brass bowl, carved with a motif of intertwining leaves on it.  It looks more decorative than useful.

name: shop counter
descripton: The oak counter looks well polished, the better display the many wares upon.  The wooden surface is inlaid with a set of scales in beech wood.
The shop counter is topped in thick, battered wood, marred by the passing of time and goods.

name: money register
descripton: The register is complex.  It has several buttons and keys.

name: carvings
descripton: The carving is deep and consists of several words in another language.

name: designed covers.
descripton: The designed covers look worn from use.
The cover is old and dusty, but made of a fine leather.

name: carpets
descripton: A decorative tapestry placed on the floor. Stylized and decorative.

name: gold and silver sculptures
descripton: The sculpture shines brightly. A gleaming testament to the material it embodies.

name: tomb
descripton: The tomb is filled with cobwebs. It has a dank, musty smell, and water dripped from the walls.

name: wrought iron chandelier
descripton: The chandelier is heavy and foreboding.  The black wrought iron portends of calamity ahead.

name: wooden doors
descripton: These doors appear quite study, and are hand crafted from oak. While they look quite old, they are well polished and cared for despite years of use.
The wooden door was splintering from being open so many times.

name: kitchen
descripton: The kitchen shows how much power resides in everyday actions.

name: meals
descripton: The meal was amouthwatering roasted chicken with cheese and bread as the sides.

name: cooking pot
descripton: A large bellied vessel for making vast portions of hearty stews, and boiling laundry.

name: riverbank
descripton: The riverbank looks steep and hard to cross.
The riverbank has rocks along its edge and there seems to be some turtles laying about sunbathing.

name: snapping turtles
descripton: This turtle looks quite disgruntled and discontented with life.  Perhaps you'd best steer clear of it.
The turtle's shell is quite dirty and looks as if it would snap if you stepped any closer.

name: broken logs
descripton: The broken logs would make great firewood.
That Log of wood is decayed almost completely by worms

name: broken weapons
descripton: This pike was broken in half at some point, and its point appears to be quite dull and rusty.

name: skulls.
descripton: Broken and battered, the skull is a reminder for those who dare trespass.
The skull has bits of rotten, dried flesh stuck to it.  It is giving off a strong odor.

name: waterfall
descripton: The waterfall flows over the side of the rock.  It is very cool water that is blue in color.

name: treasure
descripton: When you look at it closer, you see there is a missing part, like a gem had been removed from it.
The treasure is bright and captivating to behold.

name: pot of gold
descripton: The pot of gold is completely empty.  The rust on it shows it has not been full for quite some time.
THe pot of gold was found in old cave near mount Creeleaves. It is said to contain gold from the previous kingdom that was demolished by the volcano.

name: primitive fishing pole
descripton: The fishing pole was splintered and worn.

name: hatchet
descripton: The hatchet is old and worn out.

name: pin
descripton: The pin is missing some stones but the clasp still works perfectly.
the pin has many uses around the clothing

name: cottage roof
descripton: The roof looks sturdy enough.

name: hand plow
descripton: the hand plow is used for farming the fresh earth

name: bucket
descripton: The bucket is wooden, with a rope handle. It is starting to crack on one side.

name: filth from kingdom
descripton: The filth is disgusting to look at and smells like rotten corpses

name: Trash Bags
descripton: The bag is full of stench and blood.

name: Ornate table
descripton: The table is ornately carved and polished to a shine.
The ornate table, despite being covered in dust and cobwebs, appears beautifully handcrafted from solid gold with lion paw-shaped feet.

name: goblet
descripton: The goblet is made of metal and has a handle.
The goblet was made of fine and it held a strange liquid.

name: product
descripton: This product is unque and a great peice of art.

name: crates
descripton: This crate looks to be made of leftover wood scraps, as it looks like it is barely holding together.  Hopefully it does not need to travel very far.

name: Sand for the cacti
descripton: You see some movement like something is moving around just below the surface.

name: Tools for keeping the cacti trimmed
descripton: Tools for keeping the cacti trimmed are necessary for any farmer of the desert.

name: cold stone walls
descripton: the cold stone wall has several indents but still appears sturdy. you would not bet on your ability to break through it if necessary
Those stone walls look very old, they probably get really cold during the winter!

name: corridors
descripton: The corridors looked vast and empty.
A part of a building leading from place to place. It could hold secrets if examined further.

name: kingdom
descripton: The kingdom spans many miles, its stone structures standing in stark contrast to the grasslands around it.
The king rules over his land

name: secret tunnel
descripton: The tunnel is cold and damp.  It is hard to see in the tunnel.
The secret tunnel was dark and seemed to continue for a long way.

name: instruments of torture
descripton: There are several instruments of torture that can be used to gain information.

name: dunes
descripton: The dunes are massive, and have many strange animals living in them.

name: cobblestone
descripton: A stone often used to pave roads. Found in rivers. Water over the millenniums has worn away any sharp edges.

name: thick water
descripton: The water is dark and murky. Drinking it would be dangerous.

name: copper
descripton: Look at all that copper, they could make a lot of pennies with that.
The copper tea pot is a very useful item in the kitchen.

name: corn
descripton: The corn is tasty and delicious, it is big and vast.

name: sheep
descripton: The sheep is fluffy and healthy looking, it is and chewing its grass happily in the sun.

name: farm tools
descripton: The farm tools look like they could use an update.

name: food storage
descripton: The food storage is dark inside and cool, it's sealed door keeping the light from leaking in.
The storage is rusted shut, you wonder if you can open it.

name: dozens and dozens of brim fish
descripton: The fish had a beautiful shine of red, radiating from it's scales.

name: irregular rocks
descripton: The rock stands as high as a dog and is probably too heavy to lift. However, with its smooth top, it does make a good seat.
upon inspection, it is gray, smooth and oblong with no pits.

name: lush green vegetation
descripton: The plant is lush and well kept and remains fruitful to this day.

name: Tall pine trees
descripton: The tall pine trees towered overhead, and the wind blew through their branches.

name: some clothes
descripton: This clothing piece is a worn linen shirt.  It looks like it might have been dyed green originally... or maybe brown... it's hard to tell.

name: water pail
descripton: The pail had rust on it's handle and there was a hole rusted through the bottom.
The water pail is wet and slippery since it has been used earlier in the day.

name: Roots
descripton: The root grew so fast, you can see leaves starting to grow on it.

name: old tools
descripton: The tools are worn, showing their age, but still just as effective as the day they were welded.
The old tools show long disuse, covered with dust, cobwebs, and rust.

name: wooden barriers
descripton: The barrier is sturdy and strong. It will please the King to have such a powerful defense.

name: barred windows
descripton: The window is covered in thick bars, so no one can get in or out.

name: papers
descripton: The paper is disheveled and frayed along the edges.  It has a tattered look about it as though it has not been moved in decades.

name: old rusty cashier's box
descripton: The box is covered in rust and dirt.
This old rusty box has many years of use on it.

name: sewage
descripton: The drainage system in the kingdom is mediocre and the raw fresh sewage is smelled throughout the kingdom.

name: sculptures
descripton: The sculpture is a bust of a king of old, stern faced and with an elaborate crown that adorned his head.

name: wooden walls
descripton: the wall is plastered white

name: pillars
descripton: The pillar stands tall.

name: pastel sky
descripton: The sky is filled with soft and delicate pastel colors.
The beautiful pastel sky shines light all over the kingdom.

name: large pillars
descripton: The large pillar is made out of solid marble.  A closer look at the surface reveals the intricately engraved names of fallen war heroes.
The large pillars are pristine and bold. They have exquisite carvings that stood the test of time.

name: drawings
descripton: The dusty drawing contains smudged legends leading to treasures in far-off lands.

name: entrance doors
descripton: The entrance doors to the castle are handcarved and adorned with gemstones and precious metals.

name: holy water

name: dried leaves
